channel.title: Private server community
channel.description:
well ive made a advertisement and server gather for all games and servers to join the extreme server community join here
http://www.extremeservers.co.nr/
you will get a website for your server and a section in the forum
pro's of this more trafic and users for your game and site more people to help out more dev goin on
bad things someone server may be better and makes yours look bad and messyness in the forums (but thats ok if theres gonna be alot of users[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 02:23:17 AM[/size][hr]currently we have cats ragnarok server and rebirth scape on it
im looking for 1-2 more rs servers some kal mu and ko servers next
